title: The Demons of Emily Eldritch
description: She knew that she was ready to do what must be done.Emily Eldritch has known for all of her thirty-nine years that she is not who she is meant to be. Now, in an anonymous hotel in Mid-Town Manhattan, she faces the truth of her ruined life; a husband who does not love her, a child she believes she is not fit to care for, and a grief that has never been faced.And yet, in her final hours, something calls to her, reliving the events that have so reduced herâ€¦ and offering her an impossible alternative.Now Emily must choose whether to continue in this world, or take her chances in the next.
author: Martin Adil-Smith
